Articles.Content:
Long story short :

I use RemoteTech and would like to make a couple of ships to serve as mobile tracking stations. Ground based relays I can position on the far side of Kerbin to provide relay LOS when KSC is on the side facing away from the active craft.

As such, I'm looking for a mod thats compatible with 1.05 that ads some basic boat/ship parts. Doesn't need to be huge fancy military aircraft carriers or anything.
Suggestions?

Only a few working boat mods I'm aware of

Saw a comment that suggests these still work:

 

In active development

 

There's also a warship mod - don't remember the name

I've been using the old "maritime pack" but it's not maintained (it's been revived as a fresh WIP but no beta yet) and I expect 1.1 is going to break it.
The ships I've made come out looking like basic coastguard cutters, but festooned with comms gear.

On 14/03/2016 at 11:18 PM, tjsnh said:

I've been using the old "maritime pack" but it's not maintained (it's been revived as a fresh WIP but no beta yet) and I expect 1.1 is going to break it.
The ships I've made come out looking like basic coastguard cutters, but festooned with comms gear.

Maritime Pack is still being updated and will be out sometime after 1.1 comes out.

Link to the dev thread in my signature.
